summary: Shouto: This is Todoroki Enji, most known as Endeavor by people in geral but for me he is most known as... I can't remember that...
body:
Shouto: This is Todoroki Enji, most known as Endeavor by people in geral but for me he is most known as… I can’t remember that word with ’D’…

Deku: Dad?

Shouto: Demon chicken. That was a nice try, though.

tags: Nanatsu no Taizai: Imashime no Fukkatsu
Koi wa Ameagari no You ni
title: My Top 5 Anime of 2018
body:
This is really late because I did not thought about it before but here are my Top 5 Anime of 2018! I didn’t watch houndreds of anime last year but I can at least get 5 together~

5

Nanatsu no Taizai: Imashime no Fukkatsu

Ah well! I don’t think Tumblr is that crazy about the show but I personally like it a lot. And the second season was much better directed than the first! Not even a original ending! I’m a sucker for this cliche what can I say and lots of cool stuff was waiting for the second season. Very pleased with it.


4

Zombieland Saga


It’s on my list just because it was so surprisingly enjoyable and funny lol. Not the best but I enjoy it and want to see more.

3

Boku no Hero Academia 3rd Season

I don’t remember much right now and I haven’t even finished it, but I’ve read the manga and the adaptation is great anyway. I think it’s good to have it on my list

2

Hataraku Saibou ~

Aaahhh this one was so enjoyable. Adorable, likeable characters, funny…and it made my shipper heart beat a little faster. Great plus! 

1

Devilman Crybaby! 

What can I say, I wasn’t sure about the first 3 episodes and I don’t even know what kept me going but it must have been something! And the end was fucked up enough for me to like it. Any series or movie that can make me go wow, or move me gets a special place in my heart haha. I would definitely say this one was a BIG anime! 

 Honorable mention

Another Anime that I liked but didn’t feel like adding to my top 5

Koi wa Ameagari no You ni

Very beautiful anime and the story was a little refreshing. Also liked the main character a lot. A little confused about the endind but I guess that’s how it should be!
